eba6bc40-7d4f-4d60-be02-98faa9d3565e.description: Earners of the Certified Operator of Basic Office Technology (COBOT) in Microsoft Word have demonstrated exceptional competence in utilizing several basic and intermediary functions in Microsoft Word within a legal workflow. As a basis of comparison, less than 1% of associates, staff, and law students achieve an Expert score on their first attempt (i.e., before formal training).
eba6bc40-7d4f-4d60-be02-98faa9d3565e.name: COBOT Expert - Word Contract

badge_template_activities.title: Complete an assessment with scenario-based legal tasks in a completely live test environment that tracked both time and accuracy. Receive a score that demonstrates exceptional proficiency.

Demonstrate advanced skill in utilizing track changes, cut & paste, formatting, footers, hyperlinks, Styles, cross-references, page breaks, section breaks, document security, and document comparisons.
